resources.string: Bathroom Break is an app made for stressful situations. As soon as you look at the map you see your own location. By moving the map you can see the nearest toilet from your location. By pressing one of the markers you can see the route to this toilet.
Are you sure you want to close Bathroom Break?
Something went wrong, location is not available!
No GPS found! Please turn on your location.
Click on the location button in the top right corner to go to your current location.
